quote: Momentarily drained of lust, he stares at the remembered contortions to which it has driven him. His life seems a sequence of grotesque poses assumed to no purpose, a magic dance empty of belief.
quote_letters: MOMENTARILY DRAINED OF LUST HE STARES AT THE REMEMBERED CONTORTIONS TO WHICH IT HAS DRIVEN HIM HIS LIFE SEEMS A SEQUENCE OF GROTESQUE POSES ASSUMED TO NO PURPOSE A MAGIC DANCE EMPTY OF BELIEF
